text.text: SECESSION: impact grenades have a low blast radius but are much more effective against vehicles than frag grenades
SECESSION: radar structures jam radio signals within a 100m radius
SECESSION: Structures with a lot of health points are best destroyed with C4
SECESSION: if you have enough resource points (RP) it's wise to buy a vest
SECESSION: too much encumbrance in your backpack will make your accuracy suffer a lot
SECESSION: cover is your best friend, use it as often as you can
SECESSION: diving away from a grenade can save your life
SECESSION: stabbing an enemy gives you much more XP than shooting him
SECESSION: backdooring a base can be a good way to break a stalemate
SECESSION: Flanking a base can be a good way to break a stalemate
SECESSION: to capture a base, enter the dotted area which is visible on the map
SECESSION: Capturing a base requires a 2/3 majority of troops to begin the timer
SECESSION: Machineguns need you to go prone before fire, unless behind cover
SECESSION: Stun grenades have a large blast radius but don't kill
SECESSION: In a campaign, you can only respawn with your faction's weapons, unless you unlocked other faction's weapons
SECESSION: To unlock enemy weapons for your own faction, bring a few of them to an armory
SECESSION: Vehicles are easy targets to large groups of infantry, use them carefully
SECESSION: Don't let your own deaths bring you down, in RWR You will die a lot
SECESSION: There are no 'better' guns, each fulfills a different purpose and at a price
SECESSION: Shooting single shots helps a lot in reducing bullet spread
SECESSION: Spotting enemy vehicles is an easy way to gain RP
SECESSION: Selling valuables that are dropped by dead soldiers can be worth the trip
SECESSION: A vest Type-II absorbs 2 bullets, the third puts you in a wounded state
SECESSION: A camouflage suit doesn't protect you but makes you harder to detect by the AI
SECESSION: Some heavier weapons lower your movement speed
SECESSION: The commander gives attack orders - you are free to do whatever you want, though
SECESSION: Only soldiers who wore a vest can be revived with the medikit
SECESSION: If you're wounded and can't get help, hold the melee key to force respawn
